Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Person
      • Player
  • public class Player
extends Person
    Class Player - a person that is the player in an adventure game. This class is part of the Lockdown application. Lockdown is a very simple, text based adventure game. A "Player" represents one person of subclass Person in the scenery of the game, that is represented by a name, a need in this game, a string of items that he carries and his power (maximum weight that he can carry).
    Version:
    november 2020
    Author:
    Dariana Dorin

        public Player​(java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String needs)

        name - The name of the player
        needs - The name of the thing he needs
